DOC.brief_title: A Study Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Infusion
DOC.detailed_description: The Phase 1 part study design identify MTD RP2D , characterize safety , tolerability , PK . The Phase 1 part study include 2 part : dose escalation dose expansion . After confirmation RP2D expansion part Phase 1 , enrolment Phase 2 part study begin . The primary objective Phase 2 part study evaluate efficacy investigational drug administer patient relapsed refractory NHL .
